timeline.author: foldik

timeline.bodyText: Why not an empty list with List.of()?
timeline.author: foldik

timeline.bodyText: Cool, functional, but I guess foundResources.contains(resourceName) will be enough instead of foundResources.stream().anyMatch(resourceName::equals).
timeline.author: foldik

timeline.bodyText: This is strange. You try to delete credentials, then you immediately say it is failed. Where does this information comes from?
timeline.author: foldik

replies.bodyText:
Answer in the description:

If the Cleanup finds one or more credential(s) present from the resource JSON at the given tenant, Cleanup exits with error:
ERROR c.s.it.util.cleanup.CleanupUtil [nolabel] - End To End cleanup have been failed, because of credential(s) '[aws-test-1b8a1afafded4daca3e1cc5e9533f37, yarn-test-54daadca706347818431edc9c6b560]' found left behind! after all the found resources have been deleted/terminated.

This was the requirement:

"If Cleanup job should terminate / delete any resource after test, that should mean the E2E cleanup was not success. So we should investigate and fix the issue.
replies.author: aszegedi

replies.bodyText: I see. What about other resources? Don't we expect them to be deleted as well?
replies.author: foldik

replies.bodyText:
Credential(s) is(are) the final in the sequence of deleting resources. So we can rest assured if we need to delete any credential from the created ones, that means the related E2E job cleanup was not successful.
We can sure the final deletable resource from the list is the credential. If we need to delete any listed credential from the resources Json file, we need to investigate the related E2E build:

What was happened at the Cleanup phase? Is this started at the end of the test execution?
Why the E2E cleanup cannot fulfil its goal?

In this situation the amount and type (distrox, sdx, environment, credential) of the remained resources are not important for the Cleanup App. The fact: we found deletable resource(s) is the vital information and need to highlight for reviewers.
replies.author: aszegedi
